generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:300,400,700");body{padding:0;margin:0;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;color:#000;background:#fff}.page{padding:16px}.page .page-title{margin:16px 0;font-size:17px;font-weight:300;color:#000}@media screen and (min-width:0){.page .page-title{font-size:17px}}@media screen and (min-width:960px){.page .page-title{font-size:21px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.page .page-title{font-size:34px}}.page .page-subtitle{margin:16px 0;font-size:10px;font-weight:400;color:#828282}@media screen and (min-width:0){.page .page-subtitle{font-size:10px}}@media screen and (min-width:960px){.page .page-subtitle{font-size:10px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.page .page-subtitle{font-size:11px}}.page .btn{display:inline-block;border:none;min-width:120px;padding:12px 32px;margin:0;text-decoration:none;background:#000;color:#fff;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-size:11px;font-weight:700;border-radius:8px;line-height:1;cursor:pointer;text-align:center;transition:all .25s ease-in-out;-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;outline:none}@media screen and (min-width:0){.page .btn{font-size:11px}}@media screen and (min-width:960px){.page .btn{font-size:11px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.page .btn{font-size:13px}}.page .btn:hover{background:#1a1a1a}.page .btn:active{transform:scale(.99)}.page .btn.btn-primary{background:#ffcd00;color:#000}.page .btn.btn-primary:hover{background:#ffd733}.page .page-content{width:100%;max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto}.component{position:relative}.header{text-align:center}.header .header-logo{display:inline-block;padding:16px 0}.component-offers .offers-list{margin:16px 0 24px;padding:0;list-style:none}.component-offers .offers-list__action .offer-item{display:block}@media only screen and (min-width:600px){.component-offers .offers-list__action .offer-item{display:flex}}.component-offers .offers-list__action .offer-item .details__has-action{justify-content:space-between;border-top:1px solid #e8e8e8;padding-top:16px;margin-top:16px}@media only screen and (min-width:600px){.component-offers .offers-list__action .offer-item .details__has-action{display:flex;justify-content:unset;border-top:none;padding-top:0;margin-top:0}}.offer-item{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;padding:8px;border:1px solid #e8e8e8;border-top-color:transparent;transition:all .25s ease-in-out}@media only screen and (min-width:600px){.offer-item{padding:8px 16px}}.offer-item:first-child{border-top-color:#e8e8e8}.offer-item:hover{border-color:#9dcdfa;background:#fbfcff}.offer-item .details{display:flex;align-items:flex-start}.offer-item .offer-item__status .status{width:12px;height:12px;background:#000;display:block;border-radius:50%;margin-right:10px}.offer-item .offer-item__status .status.status__success{background:#44c600}.offer-item .offer-item__status .status.status__alert{background:#ff4141}.offer-item .offer-item__company{margin:0 0 5px;font-weight:400;font-size:11px}@media screen and (min-width:0){.offer-item .offer-item__company{font-size:11px}}@media screen and (min-width:960px){.offer-item .offer-item__company{font-size:11px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.offer-item .offer-item__company{font-size:13px}}.offer-item .offer-item__name{margin:0;font-size:11px;color:#828282;font-weight:300;font-size:10px}@media screen and (min-width:0){.offer-item .offer-item__name{font-size:10px}}@media screen and (min-width:960px){.offer-item .offer-item__name{font-size:10px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.offer-item .offer-item__name{font-size:11px}}.offer-item .offer-item__price{align-self:center;font-size:11px;font-weight:700}@media screen and (min-width:0){.offer-item .offer-item__price{font-size:11px}}@media screen and (min-width:960px){.offer-item .offer-item__price{font-size:11px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.offer-item .offer-item__price{font-size:13px}}.offer-item .offer-item__action{margin-left:24px}.loader{display:block;position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.5)}.loader .loader-inner{display:inline-block;width:64px;height:64px;position:relative;top:100px;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%)}.loader .loader-inner div{position:absolute;border:4px solid #000;opacity:1;border-radius:50%;animation:ripple 1s cubic-bezier(0,.2,.8,1) infinite}.loader .loader-inner div:nth-child(2){animation-delay:-.5s}@keyframes ripple{0%{top:28px;left:28px;width:0;height:0;opacity:1}to{top:-1px;left:-1px;width:58px;height:58px;opacity:0}}
